sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MutualAuth</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implementation for Mutual authentication</description>
        <name>MutualAuth</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MutualAuth = Class.create();

MutualAuth.prototype = {
   initialize : function(request, response, auth_type, auth_value) {
      this.request = request;
      this.response = response;
      this.auth_type = auth_type;
      this.auth_value = auth_value;
   },
   
   getAuthorized : function() {
      var result = GlideUser.authenticateMutualAuthToken();
      if (!result) {
         gs.log("Mutual authentication failed.");
         return null;
      }
      
      // user is authenticated, so return it...
      return result;
   }
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-06-27 00:17:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>94d0d81373211010978acff8faf6a7c9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MutualAuth</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Certificate based authentication" source="com.glide.auth.mutual">0ee374852ff25110d8a4d5f62799b66e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_94d0d81373211010978acff8faf6a7c9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-14 23:26:22</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>547</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
